hero.title: Get Involved
hero.subtitle: Join us in our mission to empower individuals and communities across Africa.

intro.title: Make a Difference
intro.description: There are many ways to support our work and create lasting change. Whether you donate, volunteer, partner with us, or spread the word, your contribution matters. Together, we can empower dreams and transform lives.

donateSection.title: Donate
donateSection.description: Your financial support enables us to provide education, microloans, and sustainable development initiatives to those who need it most.

options.description: Make a single contribution of any amount to support our work.

options.title: Monthly Giving
options.description: Join our community of monthly donors providing sustainable support.

options.title: Corporate Matching

options.title: Legacy Giving

testimonial.quote: I donate monthly because I've seen firsthand how the foundation transforms lives. My contribution is an investment in a better future for Africa.
testimonial.author: James Wilson

volunteerSection.title: Volunteer
volunteerSection.description: Share your time, skills, and passion to support our mission. Volunteers play a crucial role in expanding our impact and reaching more communities.

opportunities.title: Skills-Based Volunteering
opportunities.description: Contribute your professional expertise in areas such as finance, marketing, education, technology, or program evaluation.

opportunities.title: Event Support
opportunities.description: Help organize and run fundraising events, awareness campaigns, or community activities.

opportunities.title: Field Volunteers
opportunities.description: Work directly with our program teams and beneficiaries in the communities we serve.

opportunities.title: Administrative Support
opportunities.description: Assist with office tasks, data management, communications, and other operational needs.

testimonial.quote: Volunteering with Roberto Save Dreams Foundation has been one of the most rewarding experiences of my life. I've gained new skills, made lifelong connections, and contributed to meaningful change.
testimonial.author: Sarah Osei

partnerSection.title: Partner With Us
partnerSection.description: We believe in the power of collaboration. By partnering with organizations that share our vision, we can amplify our collective impact and create sustainable change.

partnershipTypes.title: Corporate Partnerships
partnershipTypes.description: Engage your company in meaningful social impact through financial support, employee volunteering, cause marketing, or in-kind donations.
examples: Sponsorship of specific programs or initiatives

partnershipTypes.title: Institutional Partnerships
partnershipTypes.description: Collaborate with us on program implementation, research, advocacy, or funding as a foundation, government agency, or multilateral organization.

partnershipTypes.title: Implementation Partnerships
partnershipTypes.description: Work with us as a local organization to implement programs, reach communities, and build capacity in the regions we serve.

partnershipTypes.title: Academic Partnerships
partnershipTypes.description: Engage with us as an educational institution through research, student internships, or curriculum development.

testimonial.quote: Our partnership with Roberto Save Dreams Foundation has enabled us to extend our impact in ways we couldn't have achieved alone. Their deep community connections and implementation expertise complement our resources perfectly.
testimonial.author: Michael Chen
testimonial.role: Director of CSR, Global Tech Solutions

fundraiseSection.title: Fundraise
fundraiseSection.description: Create your own fundraising campaign to support our work. Whether it's for your birthday, a special event, or a personal challenge, your fundraising efforts can make a significant difference.

ideas.title: Personal Challenges
ideas.description: Run a marathon, climb a mountain, or set another personal challenge and ask friends to sponsor you.

ideas.title: Special Occasions
ideas.description: Dedicate your birthday, wedding, or anniversary to supporting our cause instead of receiving gifts.

ideas.title: Community Events
ideas.description: Organize a dinner, concert, auction, or other event in your community to raise funds and awareness.

ideas.title: School Campaigns
ideas.description: Engage your school or university in a fundraising campaign or competition.

advocateSection.title: Advocate
advocateSection.description: Use your voice to amplify our mission and raise awareness about the issues we address. By sharing our story and spreading the word, you help us reach more people and create greater impact.

ways.title: Social Media
ways.description: Follow us on social media and share our content with your network. Use your platform to raise awareness about our work and the issues we address.

ways.title: Community Presentations
ways.description: Host a presentation or discussion about our work in your community, workplace, school, or place of worship.

ways.title: Write or Speak
ways.description: Write articles, blog posts, or speak at events about issues related to our mission and the importance of sustainable development in Africa.

ways.title: Engage Policy Makers
ways.description: Advocate for policies that support sustainable development, education, and economic opportunity in Africa.

resources.title: Advocacy Resources
items: Educational materials about our focus areas

questions.question: Can I specify which program my donation supports?
questions.answer: Yes, you can designate your donation to support a specific program area: Education, Microloans, or Sustainable Development. You can also choose 'Where Needed Most' to allow us to direct your donation to the areas of greatest need.

questions.question: Do you accept in-kind donations?
questions.answer: We accept certain in-kind donations that align with our program needs. Please contact us at donations@robertosavedreams.org to discuss potential in-kind contributions before sending any items.

questions.question: Can I volunteer remotely?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer various remote volunteer opportunities, particularly for skills-based volunteering in areas such as marketing, design, research, translation, and technology support.

questions.question: How can my company partner with the foundation?
questions.answer: We offer various corporate partnership opportunities, including program sponsorship, employee engagement, cause marketing, and in-kind support. Please contact our partnerships team at partnerships@robertosavedreams.org to discuss potential collaborations.

contactCta.title: Have Questions?
contactCta.description: Our team is here to help you find the best way to get involved based on your interests, skills, and capacity.
